actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to protect confidential sources of the news media.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides that a person connected with or employed by the news media or press cannot be required by a court, the legislature, or any administrative body, to disclose before the Congress or any other Federal court or agency, any information or the source of any information procured for publication or broadcast.

titles.title: A bill to protect confidential sources of the news media.
